SELECT a.dormitoryId,a.studentCount FROM (SELECT dormitory.dormitoryId,dormitory.dormitoryType,COUNT(student.studentNo) studentCount FROM t_dormitory dormitory LEFT JOIN t_student student ON dormitory.dormitoryId = student.studentDormitoryId GROUP BY dormitory.dormitoryId) a where 1=1
AND a.dormitoryType = '女'
AND a.dormitoryType = '男'
AND 5 > a.studentCount
AND a.studentCount >= 5

SELECT a.dormitoryId FROM (SELECT dormitory.dormitoryId,dormitory.dormitoryType,COUNT(student.studentNo) studentCount FROM t_dormitory dormitory LEFT JOIN t_student student ON dormitory.dormitoryId = student.studentDormitoryId GROUP BY dormitory.dormitoryId) a WHERE a.dormitoryType = #{studentGender} AND 5 > a.studentCount

SELECT student.studentNo,student.studentName,school.schoolName,major.majorName,class.className FROM t_student student INNER JOIN t_school school ON student.studentSchoolId = school.schoolId INNER JOIN t_major major ON student.studentMajorId = major.majorId INNER JOIN t_class class ON student.studentClassId = class.classId WHERE student.studentDormitoryId = #{dormitoryId}
